fields.name: Sweeping Lens (Trinket)
fields.description: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Reveals and disables nearby invisible traps and invisible wards for 6 seconds in a small radius (120 second cooldown). At level 9, cast range and sweep radius increase by 50% each and the cooldown is reduced to 75 seconds. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
